0: AN ACT GRANTING INCENTIVES TO QUALIFIED TAXPAYERS BY EXEMPTING THEM FROM AUDIT AND INVESTIGATION IF THEY PAY AT LEAST TWENTY PERCENT MORE OF INCOME TAX, VAT, EXCISE AND PERCENTAGE TAXES PAID DURING THE PREVIOUS TAXABLE YEAR
